description:
Cocoa decides to send some pictures of her new friends to her family back home, but Chino is very shy around cameras. Cocoa`s mission to capture Chino smiling begins! Meanwhile, Chiya`s Japanese sweets shop Ama Usa An is featured in a magazine, alongside several other cafés in the area... but Rabbit House is not among them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Egao to Flash ga Yakamashii Kore ga Watashi no Jishou Ane Desu
Her Smile and Flash Are Annoying: That`s My So-Called Older Sister
笑顔とフラッシュがやかましいこれが私の自称姉です
